name: A Great Day(+16)
description:
A short experience  for a gamejam.

Gamejam: https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-123

Theme: Same,but different

Unfortunately for now I could only do this.

 I always wanted to talk about a more serious theme and this gamejam allowed me. Thank you all for playing. I intend to make a bigger game about that theme in the future. But i do not have money to pay my  game engine for now so i use the free version of it for now.
